commandDescription.en-US: Tells you what is for sale in the shop or when it is for sale
commandDescription.fr: Te dit ce qui est en vente dans la boutique ou quand c'est en vente
commandDescription.pt-BR: Te diz o que está à venda na loja ou quando vai estar à venda

help.en-US:
Type $<commandMention> to know what is for sale in the shop
Type $<commandMention> `$<outfitOptionDescription>` to know when `$<outfitOptionDescription>` is for sale in the shop
help.fr:
Tape $<commandMention> pour savoir ce qui est en vente dans la boutique
Tape $<commandMention> `$<outfitOptionDescription>` pour savoir quand `$<outfitOptionDescription>` est en vente dans la boutique
help.pt-BR:
Digite $<commandMention> pra saber o que está à venda na loja
Digite $<commandMention> `$<outfitOptionDescription>` pra saber quando `$<outfitOptionDescription>` estará à venda na loja

reply.en-US:
**$<outfitName>** will be for sale in the shop for $<costConjunction> for 8 hours starting:
$<scheduleList>
reply.fr:
**$<outfitName>** sera en vente dans la boutique pour $<costConjunction> durant 8 heures à partir de :
$<scheduleList>
reply.pt-BR:
**$<outfitName>** vai estar à venda na loja por $<costConjunction> por 8 horas, começando em:
$<scheduleList>

bareReply.en-US:
The outfits for sale in the shop change every 8 hours:
$<scheduleList>
bareReply.fr:
Les tenues en vente dans la boutique changent toutes les 8 heures :
$<scheduleList>
bareReply.pt-BR:
As roupas à venda na loja mudam a cada 8 horas:
$<scheduleList>
